name: epam-project
description: Welcome to **AdWall**, a web application designed to connect **property owners** and **advertisers** seamlessly. If you have a **compound wall, building facade, or any outdoor space**, you can **rent it out** as an advertising space and earn passive income. On the other hand, businesses and advertisers looking for **high-visibility locations** can easily browse and book spaces for their marketing campaigns.
author: SBN RAJU
